https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1bZvNiywc6xuJhqZNKFiVUFi54O.jpg France, 1986. When Hughes, a young man from the French West Indies, discovers the new Freetime ad, it is a shock : France, the country where he was born, to which he owes his life and his identity, considers him a cannibal. This is the start of a radical awareness fueled by anger and frustration. Black Soldier
